entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.2°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
